1. Incorrect start command, please double check the start command and parameters.
2. Incorrectly configured host environment (e.g. no Java installed or PATH issue).

Native start command: 
{{startCommand}}

Emulation terminal: Please report to the system administrator, check with a technical specialist, or troubleshoot on your own.
